name: adshare-peer-server
description: Peer server for serving/uploading ads to the proxy server. Join the swarm!

scripts.test: env-cmd -e test --fallback --verbose cross-env npm run start:test
scripts.start: env-cmd -e production --fallback cross-env npm run start:prod
scripts.dev: env-cmd -e development --fallback --verbose cross-env npm run start:dev

author: Bennett Gunson
